description: This PHP source file manages Wi-Fi network configuration settings, including radio enable/disable, SSID details, security settings, channel selection, bandwidth, WPS, band steering, and related network parameters. It includes code to retrieve current configuration values, dynamically generate UI elements, and handle user interactions for managing wireless connections.

methods.name: showSteeringHistoryDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog with band steering history data.

methods.name: steering_history
methods.description: Fetches and displays band steering history logs via AJAX.

methods.name: saveBandSteeringSettings
methods.description: Saves settings related to band steering, including utilization thresholds and Rssi thresholds.

methods.name: pair_client
methods.description: Initiates WPS pairing process for a client device, optionally with PIN validation.

methods.name: save_filter
methods.description: Saves wireless filtering rules for the specified SSID.

methods.name: save_config
methods.description: Saves the general wireless network configuration parameters such as mode, channel, bandwidth, etc.

methods.name: save_enable
methods.description: Enables or disables radio and WPS functionalities based on user interaction.
